long_description: With a seat and pedals positioned specifically for easy riding, the Electra Townie 21D Bike lets you cruise down the road in total comfort. Flat Foot Technology(R) places rider upright for comfortable, heads-up positioning; aft positioning allows a rider to place both feet on the ground at a stop. Ergonomic saddle with shock-absorbing elastomers offers bump-smoothing comfort for all-day riding. Shimano EZ-Fire Plus trigger shifters and Tourney rear derailleur provide smooth shifting through the 21 gear combinations. Linear-pull brakes provide controlled deceleration for easy stopping. Semi-slick 26 x 2.0 tires ensure a smooth and stable ride over a variety of road or gravel surfaces. Platform pedals deliver total convenience-no special shoes required. One size fits most. Specs on the the Townie 21D Bike are subject to change.
